greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k)=n*(n+1)*((3*k+2)*n+1)/6, 0<=k<=n.
comment: Row sums give A132122; central terms give A132123
formula: G.f.: Sum_{n>=0} Sum_{k>=0} T(n,k)*x^n*y^k = x*(x*y+1+x)/((1-x)^4*(1-y)^2). - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 28 2016. Note that this generates a full array, not just the triangular subspace.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 12 2007
